text: Horacio Gómez Bolaños (June 28, 1930 - November 21, 1999) was a Mexican actor. He was the brother of Roberto Gómez Bolaños. On the TV show El Chavo del 8, he played the character Godinez. Bolaños died on November 21, 1999 of a heart attack during the production of a tribute to Chespirito for Televisa, aged 69. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Mexican comedians Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican movie directors Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Mexican television actors
title: Horacio Gómez Bolaños
